about_the_game:
The Multi-Medium is a visually unique 2D puzzle-platformer adventure in which you play as an interdimensional explorer in the multiverse. The world is watching as you embark on a first-of-its-kind expedition to explore parallel universes, but something goes wrong... there is a glitch in the technology and you can't get back home. Lost in the multiverse, you embark on a journey to find your place in each world and in the cosmos.

Jump, climb, swing, swim, toss, and grapple your way through 10 diverse universes, each with its own distinct art style, setting, and story.

Each level of the game is painted or drawn in a different physical medium, scanned, then brought to life in the game. Absolutely no digital art was used in the making of the game.

Features:
- 10 worlds, each with its own distinct art style, setting, and story
- new mechanics in each level to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting
- 7 bizarre boss fights/encounters
- plenty of strange characters to meet
- hidden secrets in every level

highlighted.name: Chew You Up and Spit You Out

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (x86-64)
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.8Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 750 or faster
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina or higher
  • Processor: Core i5-8257U or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 645 or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: The Multi-Medium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.8+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: The Multi-Medium is a visually unique 2D puzzle platform adventure in which you play as an interdimensional explorer lost in the multiverse. Travel to diverse worlds, each drawn or painted by hand in a different medium and style, in search of your place in the cosmos.
supported_languages: English, French, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean
